channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Open Source -- Escargot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Open Source -- Escargot

item.title: CVE-2024-32671|2024-07-29T18:33:04.077Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- escargot
item.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Samsung Open Source Escargot JavaScript engine allows Overflow Buffers.This issue affects Escargot: 4.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32671|2024-07-29T02:33:54.477Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- escargot
item.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Samsung Open Source Escargot JavaScript engine allows Overflow Buffers.This issue affects Escargot: 4.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32672|2024-06-04T17:51:43.033Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- escargot
item.description:
A Segmentation Fault issue discovered in
Samsung Open Source Escargot JavaScript engine
allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted input.
This issue affects Escargot: 4.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32669|2024-06-04T17:52:10.821Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- escargot
item.description:
Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Samsung Open Source escargot JavaScript engine allows Overflow Buffers. However, it occurs in the test code and does not include in the release.
This issue affects escargot: 4.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32671|2024-07-29T13:52:21.454Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- escargot
item.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Samsung Open Source Escargot JavaScript engine allows Overflow Buffers.This issue affects Escargot: 4.0.0.
